attributes.additional_details: To save the foundations of our music industry & preserve the history of music & upcoming music.
attributes.background: One massive, shout out to Parliament & the top end of the music industry. You can help stop the closer of music venues. lets do it now before it’s to late. It’s apparent now that Grassroots music venues are globally under threat. Almost 600 in the uk alone could close down in the few months

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announcement a specific package of support for the arts sector, including music venues. You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/157-billion-investment-to-protect-britains-world-class-cultural-arts-and-heritage-institutions
   
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do in addition to these measures.
